description: Map of the project repository for agent navigation.

manifests/.description: This directory. Contains all project manifest files. The SSOT for project structure.

memory-bank/.description: The project's 'data lake'. Contains all raw and processed information.

memory-bank/context/current-context/comm.description: Raw transcripts and chat logs. Primary source for understanding project history and stakeholder intent.

memory-bank/Scrum/.description: Agent-specific work folders from previous experiments. Good source for architectural patterns and reusable prompts.

repositories/customer-gitlab/docs-cfa-rw.description: The official documentation repository. Contains the canonical architecture, legal, and security documents.

scripts/.description: Utility scripts for project automation (e.g., manifest validation, ETL).
